CjkBigramTokenFilterScripts.name: CjkBigramTokenFilterScripts
CjkBigramTokenFilterScripts.description: Scripts that can be ignored by CjkBigramTokenFilter.

EdgeNGramTokenFilterSide.name: EdgeNGramTokenFilterSide
EdgeNGramTokenFilterSide.description: Specifies which side of the input an n-gram should be generated from.

IndexerExecutionStatus.name: IndexerExecutionStatus
IndexerExecutionStatus.description: Represents the status of an individual indexer execution.

MicrosoftStemmingTokenizerLanguage.name: MicrosoftStemmingTokenizerLanguage
MicrosoftStemmingTokenizerLanguage.description: Lists the languages supported by the Microsoft language stemming tokenizer.

MicrosoftTokenizerLanguage.name: MicrosoftTokenizerLanguage
MicrosoftTokenizerLanguage.description: Lists the languages supported by the Microsoft language tokenizer.

PhoneticEncoder.name: PhoneticEncoder
PhoneticEncoder.description: Identifies the type of phonetic encoder to use with a PhoneticTokenFilter.

ScoringFunctionAggregation.name: ScoringFunctionAggregation
ScoringFunctionAggregation.description: Defines the aggregation function used to combine the results of all the scoring functions in a scoring profile.

ScoringFunctionInterpolation.name: ScoringFunctionInterpolation
ScoringFunctionInterpolation.description: Defines the function used to interpolate score boosting across a range of documents.

SnowballTokenFilterLanguage.name: SnowballTokenFilterLanguage
SnowballTokenFilterLanguage.description: The language to use for a Snowball token filter.

StemmerTokenFilterLanguage.name: StemmerTokenFilterLanguage
StemmerTokenFilterLanguage.description: The language to use for a stemmer token filter.

StopwordsList.name: StopwordsList
StopwordsList.description: Identifies a predefined list of language-specific stopwords.

SuggesterSearchMode.name: SuggesterSearchMode
SuggesterSearchMode.description: Describes the type of suggester to use.

TokenCharacterKind.name: TokenCharacterKind
TokenCharacterKind.description: Represents classes of characters on which a token filter can operate.

AnalyzeRequest.name: AnalyzeRequest
AnalyzeRequest.description: The text and analyzer or analysis components to test.

text.name: text
text.description: The text to break into tokens.

analyzer.name: analyzer
analyzer.description: The name of the analyzer to use to break the given text. If this parameter is not specified, you must specify a tokenizer instead. The tokenizer and analyzer parameters are mutually exclusive.

tokenizer.name: tokenizer
tokenizer.description: The name of the tokenizer to use to break the given text. If this parameter is not specified, you must specify an analyzer instead. The tokenizer and analyzer parameters are mutually exclusive.

tokenFilters.name: tokenFilters
tokenFilters.description: An optional list of token filters to use when breaking the given text. This parameter can only be set when using the tokenizer parameter.

charFilters.name: charFilters
charFilters.description: An optional list of character filters to use when breaking the given text. This parameter can only be set when using the tokenizer parameter.

AnalyzeResult.name: AnalyzeResult
AnalyzeResult.description: The result of testing an analyzer on text.

tokens.name: tokens
tokens.description: The list of tokens returned by the analyzer specified in the request.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the analyzer. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores, can only start and end with alphanumeric characters, and is limited to 128 characters.

AnalyzerName.name: AnalyzerName
AnalyzerName.description: Defines the names of all text analyzers supported by Azure Search.

AsciiFoldingTokenFilter.name: AsciiFoldingTokenFilter
AsciiFoldingTokenFilter.description: Converts alphabetic, numeric, and symbolic Unicode characters which are not in the first 127 ASCII characters (the "Basic Latin" Unicode block) into their ASCII equivalents, if such equivalents exist. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

CharFilter.name: CharFilter
CharFilter.description: Abstract base class for character filters.

CharFilterName.name: CharFilterName
CharFilterName.description: Defines the names of all character filters supported by Azure Search.

CjkBigramTokenFilter.name: CjkBigramTokenFilter
CjkBigramTokenFilter.description: Forms bigrams of CJK terms that are generated from StandardTokenizer. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

ClassicTokenizer.name: ClassicTokenizer
ClassicTokenizer.description: Grammar-based tokenizer that is suitable for processing most European-language documents. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

CommonGramTokenFilter.name: CommonGramTokenFilter
CommonGramTokenFilter.description: Construct bigrams for frequently occurring terms while indexing. Single terms are still indexed too, with bigrams overlaid. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

CorsOptions.name: CorsOptions
CorsOptions.description: Defines options to control Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for an index.

allowedOrigins.name: allowedOrigins
allowedOrigins.description: The list of origins from which JavaScript code will be granted access to your index. Can contain a list of hosts of the form {protocol}://{fully-qualified-domain-name}[:{port#}], or a single '*' to allow all origins (not recommended).

maxAgeInSeconds.name: maxAgeInSeconds
maxAgeInSeconds.description: The duration for which browsers should cache CORS preflight responses. Defaults to 5 mintues.

CustomAnalyzer.name: CustomAnalyzer
CustomAnalyzer.description: Allows you to take control over the process of converting text into indexable/searchable tokens. It's a user-defined configuration consisting of a single predefined tokenizer and one or more filters. The tokenizer is responsible for breaking text into tokens, and the filters for modifying tokens emitted by the tokenizer.

DataChangeDetectionPolicy.name: DataChangeDetectionPolicy
DataChangeDetectionPolicy.description: Abstract base class for data change detection policies.

DataContainer.name: DataContainer
DataContainer.description: Represents information about the entity (such as Azure SQL table or DocumentDb collection) that will be indexed.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the table or view (for Azure SQL data source) or collection (for DocumentDB data source) that will be indexed.

query.name: query
query.description: A query that is applied to this data container. The syntax and meaning of this parameter is datasource-specific. Not supported by Azure SQL datasources.

DataDeletionDetectionPolicy.name: DataDeletionDetectionPolicy
DataDeletionDetectionPolicy.description: Abstract base class for data deletion detection policies.

DataSource.name: DataSource
DataSource.description: The definition of the datasource to create or update.

container.name: container
container.description: The data container for the datasource.

dataChangeDetectionPolicy.name: dataChangeDetectionPolicy
dataChangeDetectionPolicy.description: The data change detection policy for the datasource.

dataDeletionDetectionPolicy.name: dataDeletionDetectionPolicy
dataDeletionDetectionPolicy.description: The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.

DataSourceCredentials.name: DataSourceCredentials
DataSourceCredentials.description: Represents credentials that can be used to connect to a datasource.

connectionString.name: connectionString
connectionString.description: The connection string for the datasource.

DataSourceListResult.name: DataSourceListResult
DataSourceListResult.description: Response from a List Datasources request. If successful, it includes the full definitions of all datasources.

value.name: value
value.description: The datasources in the Search service.

DataSourceType.name: DataSourceType
DataSourceType.description: Defines the type of an Azure Search datasource.

DataType.name: DataType
DataType.description: Defines the data type of a field in an Azure Search index.

DictionaryDecompounderTokenFilter.name: DictionaryDecompounderTokenFilter
DictionaryDecompounderTokenFilter.description: Decomposes compound words found in many Germanic languages. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

DistanceScoringFunction.name: DistanceScoringFunction
DistanceScoringFunction.description: Defines a function that boosts scores based on distance from a geographic location.

DistanceScoringParameters.name: DistanceScoringParameters
DistanceScoringParameters.description: Provides parameter values to a distance scoring function.

referencePointParameter.name: referencePointParameter
referencePointParameter.description: The name of the parameter passed in search queries to specify the reference location.

boostingDistance.name: boostingDistance
boostingDistance.description: The distance in kilometers from the reference location where the boosting range ends.

EdgeNGramTokenFilter.name: EdgeNGramTokenFilter
EdgeNGramTokenFilter.description: Generates n-grams of the given size(s) starting from the front or the back of an input token. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

EdgeNGramTokenizer.name: EdgeNGramTokenizer
EdgeNGramTokenizer.description: Tokenizes the input from an edge into n-grams of the given size(s). This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

ElisionTokenFilter.name: ElisionTokenFilter
ElisionTokenFilter.description: Removes elisions. For example, "l'avion" (the plane) will be converted to "avion" (plane). This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

Field.name: Field
Field.description: Represents a field in an index definition in Azure Search, which describes the name, data type, and search behavior of a field.

type.name: type
type.description: The data type of the field.

analyzer.name: analyzer
analyzer.description: The name of the analyzer to use for the field at search time and indexing time. This option can be used only with searchable fields and it can't be set together with either searchAnalyzer or indexAnalyzer. Once the analyzer is chosen, it cannot be changed for the field.

searchAnalyzer.name: searchAnalyzer
searchAnalyzer.description: The name of the analyzer used at search time for the field. This option can be used only with searchable fields. It must be set together with indexAnalyzer and it cannot be set together with the analyzer option. This analyzer can be updated on an existing field.

indexAnalyzer.name: indexAnalyzer
indexAnalyzer.description: The name of the analyzer used at indexing time for the field. This option can be used only with searchable fields. It must be set together with searchAnalyzer and it cannot be set together with the analyzer option. Once the analyzer is chosen, it cannot be changed for the field.

key.name: key
key.description: A value indicating whether the field is the key of the index. Valid only for string fields. Every index must have exactly one key field.

searchable.name: searchable
searchable.description: A value indicating whether the field is included in full-text searches. Valid only forstring or string collection fields. Default is false.

filterable.name: filterable
filterable.description: A value indicating whether the field can be used in filter expressions. Default is false.

sortable.name: sortable
sortable.description: A value indicating whether the field can be used in orderby expressions. Not valid for string collection fields. Default is false.

facetable.name: facetable
facetable.description: A value indicating whether it is possible to facet on this field. Not valid for geo-point fields. Default is false.

retrievable.name: retrievable
retrievable.description: A value indicating whether the field can be returned in a search result. Default is true.

FieldMapping.name: FieldMapping
FieldMapping.description: Defines a mapping between a field in a data source and a target field in an index.

sourceFieldName.name: sourceFieldName
sourceFieldName.description: The name of the field in the data source.

targetFieldName.name: targetFieldName
targetFieldName.description: The name of the target field in the index. Same as the source field name by default.

mappingFunction.name: mappingFunction
mappingFunction.description: A function to apply to each source field value before indexing.

FieldMappingFunction.name: FieldMappingFunction
FieldMappingFunction.description: Represents a function that transforms a value from a data source before indexing.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the field mapping function.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: A dictionary of parameter name/value pairs to pass to the function. Each value must be of a primitive type.

FreshnessScoringFunction.name: FreshnessScoringFunction
FreshnessScoringFunction.description: Defines a function that boosts scores based on the value of a date-time field.

FreshnessScoringParameters.name: FreshnessScoringParameters
FreshnessScoringParameters.description: Provides parameter values to a freshness scoring function.

boostingDuration.name: boostingDuration
boostingDuration.description: The expiration period after which boosting will stop for a particular document.

HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy.name: HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy
HighWaterMarkChangeDetectionPolicy.description: Defines a data change detection policy that captures changes based on the value of a high water mark column.

Index.name: Index
Index.description: The definition of the index to create or update.

scoringProfiles.name: scoringProfiles
scoringProfiles.description: The scoring profiles for the index.

defaultScoringProfile.name: defaultScoringProfile
defaultScoringProfile.description: The name of the scoring profile to use if none is specified in the query. If this property is not set and no scoring profile is specified in the query, then default scoring (tf-idf) will be used.

corsOptions.name: corsOptions
corsOptions.description: Options to control Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) for the index.

tokenFilters.name: tokenFilters
tokenFilters.description: The token filters for the index.

charFilters.name: charFilters
charFilters.description: The character filters for the index.

IndexGetStatisticsResult.name: IndexGetStatisticsResult
IndexGetStatisticsResult.description: Statistics for a given index. Statistics are collected periodically and are not guaranteed to always be up-to-date.

documentCount.name: documentCount
documentCount.description: The number of documents in the index.

storageSize.name: storageSize
storageSize.description: The amount of storage in bytes consumed by the index.

IndexListResult.name: IndexListResult
IndexListResult.description: Response from a List Indexes request. If successful, it includes the full definitions of all indexes.

value.name: value
value.description: The indexes in the Search service.

Indexer.name: Indexer
Indexer.description: The definition of the indexer to create or update.

dataSourceName.name: dataSourceName
dataSourceName.description: The name of the datasource from which this indexer reads data.

targetIndexName.name: targetIndexName
targetIndexName.description: The name of the index to which this indexer writes data.

fieldMappings.name: fieldMappings
fieldMappings.description: Defines mappings between fields in the data source and corresponding target fields in the index.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: A value indicating whether the indexer is disabled. Default is false.

IndexerExecutionInfo.name: IndexerExecutionInfo
IndexerExecutionInfo.description: Represents the current status and execution history of an indexer.

lastResult.name: lastResult
lastResult.description: The result of the most recent or an in-progress indexer execution.

executionHistory.name: executionHistory
executionHistory.description: History of the recent indexer executions, sorted in reverse chronological order.

IndexerExecutionResult.name: IndexerExecutionResult
IndexerExecutionResult.description: Represents the result of an individual indexer execution.

status.name: status
status.description: The outcome of this indexer execution.

errorMessage.name: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The error message indicating the top-level error, if any.

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.description: The start time of this indexer execution.

endTime.name: endTime
endTime.description: The end time of this indexer execution, if the execution has already completed.

itemsProcessed.name: itemsProcessed
itemsProcessed.description: The number of items that were processed during this indexer execution. This includes both successfully processed items and items where indexing was attempted but failed.

itemsFailed.name: itemsFailed
itemsFailed.description: The number of items that failed to be indexed during this indexer execution.

initialTrackingState.name: initialTrackingState
initialTrackingState.description: Change tracking state with which an indexer execution started.

finalTrackingState.name: finalTrackingState
finalTrackingState.description: Change tracking state with which an indexer execution finished.

IndexerListResult.name: IndexerListResult
IndexerListResult.description: Response from a List Indexers request. If successful, it includes the full definitions of all indexers.

value.name: value
value.description: The indexers in the Search service.

batchSize.name: batchSize
batchSize.description: The number of items that are read from the data source and indexed as a single batch in order to improve performance. The default depends on the data source type.

maxFailedItems.name: maxFailedItems
maxFailedItems.description: The maximum number of items that can fail indexing for indexer execution to still be considered successful. -1 means no limit. Default is 0.

maxFailedItemsPerBatch.name: maxFailedItemsPerBatch
maxFailedItemsPerBatch.description: The maximum number of items in a single batch that can fail indexing for the batch to still be considered successful. -1 means no limit. Default is 0.

base64EncodeKeys.name: base64EncodeKeys
base64EncodeKeys.description: Whether indexer will base64-encode all values that are inserted into key field of the target index. This is needed if keys can contain characters that are invalid in keys (such as dot '.'). Default is false.

configuration.name: configuration
configuration.description: A dictionary of indexer-specific configuration properties. Each name is the name of a specific property. Each value must be of a primitive type.

IndexingSchedule.name: IndexingSchedule
IndexingSchedule.description: Represents a schedule for indexer execution.

interval.name: interval
interval.description: The interval of time between indexer executions.

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.description: The time when an indexer should start running.

ItemError.name: ItemError
ItemError.description: Represents an item- or document-level indexing error.

key.name: key
key.description: The key of the item for which indexing failed.

errorMessage.name: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The message describing the error that occurred while attempting to index the item.

KeepTokenFilter.name: KeepTokenFilter
KeepTokenFilter.description: A token filter that only keeps tokens with text contained in a specified list of words. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

KeywordMarkerTokenFilter.name: KeywordMarkerTokenFilter
KeywordMarkerTokenFilter.description: Marks terms as keywords. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

KeywordTokenizer.name: KeywordTokenizer
KeywordTokenizer.description: Emits the entire input as a single token. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

LengthTokenFilter.name: LengthTokenFilter
LengthTokenFilter.description: Removes words that are too long or too short. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

LimitTokenFilter.name: LimitTokenFilter
LimitTokenFilter.description: Limits the number of tokens while indexing. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

MagnitudeScoringFunction.name: MagnitudeScoringFunction
MagnitudeScoringFunction.description: Defines a function that boosts scores based on the magnitude of a numeric field.

MagnitudeScoringParameters.name: MagnitudeScoringParameters
MagnitudeScoringParameters.description: Provides parameter values to a magnitude scoring function.

boostingRangeStart.name: boostingRangeStart
boostingRangeStart.description: The field value at which boosting starts.

boostingRangeEnd.name: boostingRangeEnd
boostingRangeEnd.description: The field value at which boosting ends.

constantBoostBeyondRange.name: constantBoostBeyondRange
constantBoostBeyondRange.description: A value indicating whether to apply a constant boost for field values beyond the range end value; default is false.

MappingCharFilter.name: MappingCharFilter
MappingCharFilter.description: A character filter that applies mappings defined with the mappings option. Matching is greedy (longest pattern matching at a given point wins). Replacement is allowed to be the empty string. This character filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

MicrosoftLanguageStemmingTokenizer.name: MicrosoftLanguageStemmingTokenizer
MicrosoftLanguageStemmingTokenizer.description: Divides text using language-specific rules and reduces words to their base forms.

NGramTokenFilter.name: NGramTokenFilter
NGramTokenFilter.description: Generates n-grams of the given size(s). This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

NGramTokenizer.name: NGramTokenizer
NGramTokenizer.description: Tokenizes the input into n-grams of the given size(s). This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PathHierarchyTokenizer.name: PathHierarchyTokenizer
PathHierarchyTokenizer.description: Tokenizer for path-like hierarchies. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PatternAnalyzer.name: PatternAnalyzer
PatternAnalyzer.description: Flexibly separates text into terms via a regular expression pattern. This analyzer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PatternCaptureTokenFilter.name: PatternCaptureTokenFilter
PatternCaptureTokenFilter.description: Uses Java regexes to emit multiple tokens - one for each capture group in one or more patterns. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PatternReplaceCharFilter.name: PatternReplaceCharFilter
PatternReplaceCharFilter.description: A character filter that replaces characters in the input string. It uses a regular expression to identify character sequences to preserve and a replacement pattern to identify characters to replace. For example, given the input text "aa bb aa bb", pattern "(aa)\s+(bb)", and replacement "$1#$2", the result would be "aa#bb aa#bb". This character filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PatternReplaceTokenFilter.name: PatternReplaceTokenFilter
PatternReplaceTokenFilter.description: A character filter that replaces characters in the input string. It uses a regular expression to identify character sequences to preserve and a replacement pattern to identify characters to replace. For example, given the input text "aa bb aa bb", pattern "(aa)\s+(bb)", and replacement "$1#$2", the result would be "aa#bb aa#bb". This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PatternTokenizer.name: PatternTokenizer
PatternTokenizer.description: Tokenizer that uses regex pattern matching to construct distinct tokens. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

PhoneticTokenFilter.name: PhoneticTokenFilter
PhoneticTokenFilter.description: Create tokens for phonetic matches. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

RegexFlags.name: RegexFlags
RegexFlags.description: Defines flags that can be combined to control how regular expressions are used in the pattern analyzer and pattern tokenizer.

ScoringFunction.name: ScoringFunction
ScoringFunction.description: Abstract base class for functions that can modify document scores during ranking.

fieldName.name: fieldName
fieldName.description: The name of the field used as input to the scoring function.

boost.name: boost
boost.description: A multiplier for the raw score. Must be a positive number not equal to 1.0.

interpolation.name: interpolation
interpolation.description: A value indicating how boosting will be interpolated across document scores; defaults to "Linear".

ScoringProfile.name: ScoringProfile
ScoringProfile.description: Defines parameters for an Azure Search index that influence scoring in search queries.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the scoring profile.

text.name: text
text.description: Parameters that boost scoring based on text matches in certain index fields.

functions.name: functions
functions.description: The collection of functions that influence the scoring of documents.

functionAggregation.name: functionAggregation
functionAggregation.description: A value indicating how the results of individual scoring functions should be combined. Defaults to "Sum". Ignored if there are no scoring functions.

ShingleTokenFilter.name: ShingleTokenFilter
ShingleTokenFilter.description: Creates combinations of tokens as a single token. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

SnowballTokenFilter.name: SnowballTokenFilter
SnowballTokenFilter.description: A filter that stems words using a Snowball-generated stemmer. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

SoftDeleteColumnDeletionDetectionPolicy.name: SoftDeleteColumnDeletionDetectionPolicy
SoftDeleteColumnDeletionDetectionPolicy.description: Defines a data deletion detection policy that implements a soft-deletion strategy. It determines whether an item should be deleted based on the value of a designated 'soft delete' column.

SqlIntegratedChangeTrackingPolicy.name: SqlIntegratedChangeTrackingPolicy
SqlIntegratedChangeTrackingPolicy.description: Defines a data change detection policy that captures changes using the Integrated Change Tracking feature of Azure SQL Database.

StandardAnalyzer.name: StandardAnalyzer
StandardAnalyzer.description: Standard Apache Lucene analyzer; Composed of the standard tokenizer, lowercase filter and stop filter.

StandardTokenizer.name: StandardTokenizer
StandardTokenizer.description: Breaks text following the Unicode Text Segmentation rules. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

StemmerOverrideTokenFilter.name: StemmerOverrideTokenFilter
StemmerOverrideTokenFilter.description: Provides the ability to override other stemming filters with custom dictionary-based stemming. Any dictionary-stemmed terms will be marked as keywords so that they will not be stemmed with stemmers down the chain. Must be placed before any stemming filters. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

StemmerTokenFilter.name: StemmerTokenFilter
StemmerTokenFilter.description: Language specific stemming filter. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

StopAnalyzer.name: StopAnalyzer
StopAnalyzer.description: Divides text at non-letters; Applies the lowercase and stopword token filters. This analyzer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

StopwordsTokenFilter.name: StopwordsTokenFilter
StopwordsTokenFilter.description: Removes stop words from a token stream. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

Suggester.name: Suggester
Suggester.description: Defines how the Suggest API should apply to a group of fields in the index.

searchMode.name: searchMode
searchMode.description: A value indicating the capabilities of the suggester.

sourceFields.name: sourceFields
sourceFields.description: The list of field names to which the suggester applies. Each field must be searchable.

SynonymTokenFilter.name: SynonymTokenFilter
SynonymTokenFilter.description: Matches single or multi-word synonyms in a token stream. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

TagScoringFunction.name: TagScoringFunction
TagScoringFunction.description: Defines a function that boosts scores of documents with string values matching a given list of tags.

TagScoringParameters.name: TagScoringParameters
TagScoringParameters.description: Provides parameter values to a tag scoring function.

tagsParameter.name: tagsParameter
tagsParameter.description: The name of the parameter passed in search queries to specify the list of tags to compare against the target field.

TextWeights.name: TextWeights
TextWeights.description: Defines weights on index fields for which matches should boost scoring in search queries.

weights.name: weights
weights.description: The dictionary of per-field weights to boost document scoring. The keys are field names and the values are the weights for each field.

TokenFilter.name: TokenFilter
TokenFilter.description: Abstract base class for token filters.

TokenFilterName.name: TokenFilterName
TokenFilterName.description: Defines the names of all token filters supported by Azure Search.

TokenInfo.name: TokenInfo
TokenInfo.description: Information about a token returned by an analyzer.

token.name: token
token.description: The token returned by the analyzer.

startOffset.name: startOffset
startOffset.description: The index of the first character of the token in the input text.

endOffset.name: endOffset
endOffset.description: The index of the last character of the token in the input text.

position.name: position
position.description: The position of the token in the input text relative to other tokens. The first token in the input text has position 0, the next has position 1, and so on. Depending on the analyzer used, some tokens might have the same position, for example if they are synonyms of each other.

TokenizerName.name: TokenizerName
TokenizerName.description: Defines the names of all tokenizers supported by Azure Search.

TruncateTokenFilter.name: TruncateTokenFilter
TruncateTokenFilter.description: Truncates the terms to a specific length. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

UaxUrlEmailTokenizer.name: UaxUrlEmailTokenizer
UaxUrlEmailTokenizer.description: Tokenizes urls and emails as one token. This tokenizer is implemented using Apache Lucene.

UniqueTokenFilter.name: UniqueTokenFilter
UniqueTokenFilter.description: Filters out tokens with same text as the previous token. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

WordDelimiterTokenFilter.name: WordDelimiterTokenFilter
WordDelimiterTokenFilter.description: Splits words into subwords and performs optional transformations on subword groups. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

title: SearchServiceClient
description: Client that can be used to manage and query indexes and documents, as well as manage other resources, on an Azure Search service.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

methods.description: Lists all datasources available for an Azure Search service.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

methods.description: Creates a new Azure Search datasource.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

methods.description: Retrieves a datasource definition from Azure Search.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server matches this value.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match
If-None-Match.description: Defines the If-None-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server does not match this value.

methods.description: Deletes an Azure Search datasource.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server matches this value.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match
If-None-Match.description: Defines the If-None-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server does not match this value.

methods.description: Creates a new Azure Search datasource or updates a datasource if it already exists.

dataSourceName.name: dataSourceName
dataSourceName.description: The name of the datasource to retrieve.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

methods.description: Lists all indexers available for an Azure Search service.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

methods.description: Creates a new Azure Search indexer.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

methods.description: Retrieves an indexer definition from Azure Search.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server matches this value.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match
If-None-Match.description: Defines the If-None-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server does not match this value.

methods.description: Deletes an Azure Search indexer.

client-request-id.name: client-request-id
client-request-id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The operation will be performed only if the ETag on the server matches this value.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match

methods.description: Deletes an Azure Search index and all the documents it contains.

allowIndexDowntime.name: allowIndexDowntime
allowIndexDowntime.description: Allows new analyzers, tokenizers, token filters, or char filters to be added to an index by taking the index offline for at least a few seconds. This temporarily causes indexing and query requests to fail. Performance and write availability of the index can be impaired for several minutes after the index is updated, or longer for very large indexes.
